short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects to the login page in Ilias and Campus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically redirect you to the login page of Ilias and Campus of the University of Stuttgart.
Works best with browser autocomplete.
